data.actual_result: "User is typing" bar has a severe delay for adjusting
data.expected_result: "User is typing" bar adjusts immediately as the message bar size changes
data.short_description: "User is typing" bar doesn't adjust when typing and sending a long message on very poor connection (may take a couple tries, and make sure your connection is extremely poor to the point that your messages don't immediately leave your message area when pressing the send button otherwise it may not work)
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure that your messages send several seconds after you press the "Send" button to make sure you have extremely poor connection - Make sure a lot of people are typing continuously - Type a long message (at least 2-3 lines) - Observe the "User is typing bar" as you type the message - Send the message and observe the "User is typing" bar when your message sends - If you don't manage to repro the first time, try sending more long messages in a normal conversation while people are continuously typing
